name: Slayer (itch) (sauce)
description:
You are a soldier that was sent to hell to slay the demons.

How much points can you get?

Controls:
WASD - Move
LMB - Shoot with main gun
RMB - Shoot with secondary gun (doesn't use ammo)
Space - Buy 10 ammo for 5 coins.
Tab - Buy one medkit for 25 coins.
Q - Use one medkit.
Shift - Run
K - Suicide
P - Pause
E - Exchange 5 coins to 25 to 150 coins.
